item.title: Set-It-Forget-It Chicken Soup
item.description: This comforting chicken soup is a warm hug in a bowl, perfect for busy days. With minimal prep and a slow cooker, you can enjoy a hearty meal that fills your home with delicious aromas.
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
⏱️ Prep Time: 15 minutes

🍳 Cook Time: 480 minutes

⏰ Total Time: 495 minutes

🍽️ Servings: 6

📊 Difficulty: Easy

🥘 Ingredients

  • 1 pound boneless, skinless chicken breasts
  • 4 cups chicken broth
  • 2 cups mixed vegetables (carrots, peas, corn)
  • 1 onion, chopped
  • 2 cloves garlic, minced
  • 1 teaspoon dried thyme
  • Salt and pepper to taste

👩‍🍳 Instructions

  1. Place the chicken breasts in the slow cooker.
  2. Add chicken broth, mixed vegetables, onion, garlic, thyme, salt, and pepper.
  3. Cover and cook on low for 8 hours or high for 4 hours.
  4. Once cooked, shred the chicken with two forks and stir back into the soup.

📌 Pinterest Tags: #cat1761230166734 #easyrecipe #recipe #cooking #foodie #homemade #delicious #pound #chicken #mixed

📌 Save this recipe to Pinterest!

item.title: Velvety Butternut Squash Soup
item.description: This velvety butternut squash soup is a warm hug in a bowl, perfect for chilly days. With just five ingredients, it’s simple to make yet bursting with flavor, making it a delightful addition to any meal.
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
⏱️ Prep Time: 15 minutes

🍳 Cook Time: 30 minutes

⏰ Total Time: 45 minutes

🍽️ Servings: 4

📊 Difficulty: Easy

🥘 Ingredients

  • 1 medium butternut squash, peeled and cubed
  • 1 onion, chopped
  • 2 cloves garlic, minced
  • 4 cups vegetable broth
  • Salt and pepper to taste

👩‍🍳 Instructions

  1. In a large pot, sauté the onion and garlic until translucent.
  2. Add the cubed butternut squash and vegetable broth.
  3. Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer for 20 minutes until squash is tender.
  4. Blend the soup until smooth, season with salt and pepper, and serve warm.

item.title: Cozy Autumn Wild Rice Soup
item.description: Embrace the flavors of fall with this hearty and comforting wild rice soup. Packed with butternut squash, mushrooms, and a hint of autumn spice, it's the perfect dish to warm you up on chilly evenings.
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
⏱️ Prep Time: 15 minutes

🍳 Cook Time: 90 minutes

⏰ Total Time: 105 minutes

🍽️ Servings: 6

📊 Difficulty: Medium

🥘 Ingredients

  • 1 cup wild rice
  • 1 tablespoon olive oil
  • 1 medium onion, chopped
  • 2 cloves garlic, minced
  • 2 cups butternut squash, diced
  • 1 cup mushrooms, sliced
  • 4 cups vegetable broth
  • 1 teaspoon dried thyme
  • 1 teaspoon sage
  • Salt and pepper to taste

👩‍🍳 Instructions

  1. Rinse the wild rice under cold water and set aside.
  2. In a large pot, heat olive oil over medium heat. Add onion and garlic, sauté until translucent.
  3. Add butternut squash and mushrooms, cooking for about 5 minutes until softened.
  4. Stir in the wild rice, vegetable broth, thyme, and sage. Bring to a boil.
  5. Reduce heat to low, cover, and simmer for about 1 hour or until rice is tender.
  6. Season with salt and pepper to taste before serving.

item.title: Simple Creamy Potato Leek Soup
item.description: Dive into the rich flavors of this creamy potato leek soup that brings comfort in every spoonful. With minimal ingredients and a few simple steps, you can whip up this delightful dish in no time.
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
⏱️ Prep Time: 15 minutes

🍳 Cook Time: 25 minutes

⏰ Total Time: 40 minutes

🍽️ Servings: 4

📊 Difficulty: Easy

🥘 Ingredients

  • 4 large potatoes, peeled and diced
  • 2 leeks, cleaned and sliced
  • 4 cups vegetable broth
  • 1 cup heavy cream
  • Salt and pepper to taste
  • 2 tablespoons olive oil

👩‍🍳 Instructions

  1. In a large pot, heat olive oil over medium heat and add the sliced leeks. Sauté until soft, about 5 minutes.
  2. Add the diced potatoes and vegetable broth. Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer for 20 minutes until potatoes are tender.
  3. Use an immersion blender to puree the soup until smooth. Stir in the heavy cream and season with salt and pepper to taste.

📌 Pinterest Tags: #cat1761230166734 #easyrecipe #1hourmeals #recipe #cooking #foodie #homemade #delicious #large #leeks #vegetable

📌 Save this recipe to Pinterest!

item.title: Best White Bean Soup
item.description: This flavor-packed white bean soup is not only simple to make but also vegan and gluten-free, making it a perfect choice for everyone. Enjoy a warm bowl that will comfort your soul and delight your taste buds!
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
⏱️ Prep Time: 15 minutes

🍳 Cook Time: 30 minutes

⏰ Total Time: 45 minutes

🍽️ Servings: 4

📊 Difficulty: Easy

🥘 Ingredients

  • 1 pound white beans, soaked overnight
  • 2 tablespoons olive oil
  • 1 onion, chopped
  • 2 garlic cloves, minced
  • 4 cups vegetable broth
  • 1 teaspoon thyme
  • Salt and pepper to taste

👩‍🍳 Instructions

  1. In a large pot, heat olive oil over medium heat.
  2. Add onion and garlic, sauté until softened.
  3. Stir in soaked white beans, vegetable broth, and thyme.
  4. Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer for 25 minutes.
  5. Season with salt and pepper before serving.

item.title: World's Best Chili
item.description: Warm up your winter nights with this hearty and flavorful chili that’s sure to become a family favorite. Packed with rich spices and tender meat, it’s the ultimate comfort food that will leave you craving more.
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
⏱️ Prep Time: 20 minutes

🍳 Cook Time: 480 minutes

⏰ Total Time: 500 minutes

🍽️ Servings: 12

📊 Difficulty: Medium

🥘 Ingredients

  • 2 pounds ground beef
  • 1 large onion, chopped
  • 3 cloves garlic, minced
  • 2 cans (15 ounces each) kidney beans, rinsed and drained
  • 2 cans (15 ounces each) diced tomatoes
  • 1 can (6 ounces) tomato paste
  • 2 tablespoons chili powder
  • 1 tablespoon cumin
  • 1 teaspoon salt
  • 1 teaspoon pepper
  • 1 cup beef broth

👩‍🍳 Instructions

  1. In a large pot, brown the ground beef over medium heat until fully cooked.
  2. Add the chopped onion and minced garlic, cooking until the onion is translucent.
  3. Stir in the kidney beans, diced tomatoes, tomato paste, chili powder, cumin, salt, pepper, and beef broth.
  4. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer for at least 8 hours, stirring occasionally.

item.title: Cozy Autumn Wild Rice Soup
item.description: Embrace the flavors of fall with this hearty and comforting wild rice soup. Perfect for chilly evenings, it combines butternut squash, mushrooms, and a touch of autumn spice to warm your soul.
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
⏱️ Prep Time: 15 minutes

🍳 Cook Time: 90 minutes

⏰ Total Time: 105 minutes

🍽️ Servings: 6

📊 Difficulty: Medium

🥘 Ingredients

  • 1 cup wild rice
  • 4 cups vegetable broth
  • 1 medium butternut squash, peeled and diced
  • 1 cup mushrooms, sliced
  • 1 onion, chopped
  • 2 cloves garlic, minced
  • 1 teaspoon dried thyme
  • 1 teaspoon dried sage
  • Salt and pepper to taste
  • 2 tablespoons olive oil

👩‍🍳 Instructions

  1. In a large pot, heat olive oil over medium heat. Add onion and garlic, sauté until softened.
  2. Add butternut squash and mushrooms, cooking for about 5 minutes until they begin to soften.
  3. Stir in wild rice, vegetable broth, thyme, sage, salt, and pepper.
  4. Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer for about 1 hour, or until rice is tender.
  5. Adjust seasoning as needed and serve warm.

item.title: Seriously the Best Vegetable Soup
item.description: This vegetable soup is not just any soup; it's a comforting bowl of warmth filled with vibrant, healthy vegetables. Perfect for chilly evenings, it's both nourishing and satisfying, making it a go-to recipe for any season.
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
⏱️ Prep Time: 15 minutes

🍳 Cook Time: 35 minutes

⏰ Total Time: 50 minutes

🍽️ Servings: 8

📊 Difficulty: Easy

🥘 Ingredients

  • 4 cups vegetable broth
  • 2 cups chopped carrots
  • 2 cups chopped celery
  • 1 cup diced potatoes
  • 1 cup chopped onions
  • 2 cups chopped tomatoes
  • 1 tablespoon olive oil
  • 1 teaspoon dried thyme
  • Salt and pepper to taste

👩‍🍳 Instructions

  1. In a large pot, heat olive oil over medium heat.
  2. Add onions, carrots, and celery; sauté for 5 minutes until softened.
  3. Stir in the potatoes and tomatoes, then add the vegetable broth.
  4. Season with thyme, salt, and pepper; bring to a boil.
  5. Reduce heat and simmer for 25 minutes until vegetables are tender.

item.title: Gordon Ramsay’s Roasted Tomato Soup
item.description: Indulge in the rich, creamy goodness of Gordon Ramsay's Roasted Tomato Soup, bursting with deep roasted flavors. Perfect for chilly nights, this comforting dish pairs beautifully with crusty bread for a satisfying meal.
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
⏱️ Prep Time: 15 minutes

🍳 Cook Time: 30 minutes

⏰ Total Time: 45 minutes

🍽️ Servings: 4

📊 Difficulty: Medium

🥘 Ingredients

  • 2 pounds fresh tomatoes, halved
  • 4 cloves garlic, unpeeled
  • 2 tablespoons olive oil
  • 1 teaspoon salt
  • 1/2 teaspoon black pepper
  • 1 cup heavy cream
  • Fresh basil for garnish

👩‍🍳 Instructions

  1. Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C).
  2. Place the halved tomatoes and unpeeled garlic on a baking sheet, drizzle with olive oil, and season with salt and pepper.
  3. Roast in the oven for 25-30 minutes until the tomatoes are caramelized.
  4. Let the tomatoes and garlic cool slightly, then peel the garlic.
  5. In a blender, combine the roasted tomatoes, garlic, and heavy cream, and blend until smooth.
  6. Heat the soup in a pot over medium heat until warmed through, then serve garnished with fresh basil.

📌 Pinterest Tags: #cat1761230166734 #mediumrecipe #1hourmeals #recipe #cooking #foodie #homemade #delicious #fresh #cloves #olive

📌 Save this recipe to Pinterest!

Perfect for meal planning and sharing with friends

item.title: Creamy Carrot Soup
item.description: This creamy carrot soup is a delightful blend of flavors that will warm your soul. With its velvety texture and rich taste, it's perfect for any occasion.
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
⏱️ Prep Time: 15 minutes

🍳 Cook Time: 30 minutes

⏰ Total Time: 45 minutes

🍽️ Servings: 8

📊 Difficulty: Easy

🥘 Ingredients

  • 2 pounds carrots, peeled and chopped
  • 1 onion, chopped
  • 2 tablespoons olive oil
  • 4 cups vegetable broth
  • 1 cup heavy cream
  • Salt and pepper to taste

👩‍🍳 Instructions

  1. In a large pot, heat olive oil over medium heat. Add onions and sauté until translucent.
  2. Add the chopped carrots and vegetable broth. Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer until carrots are tender, about 20 minutes.
  3. Using an immersion blender, puree the soup until smooth. Stir in the heavy cream and season with salt and pepper.

item.title: Matzo Ball Soup
item.description: Warm, comforting, and filled with rich flavors, Matzo Ball Soup is the perfect dish to nourish both body and soul. This classic recipe combines fluffy matzo balls with a savory chicken broth and fresh vegetables, making it a beloved favorite for any occasion.
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
⏱️ Prep Time: 15 minutes

🍳 Cook Time: 90 minutes

⏰ Total Time: 105 minutes

🍽️ Servings: 4

📊 Difficulty: Medium

🥘 Ingredients

  • 4 eggs
  • 1 cup matzo meal
  • 1/4 cup oil or schmaltz
  • 1/4 cup seltzer water
  • salt
  • 8 cups chicken broth
  • 2 carrots, diced
  • 2 celery stalks, diced
  • 1 onion, chopped
  • fresh dill, for garnish
  • fresh parsley, for garnish
  • cooked chicken (optional)

👩‍🍳 Instructions

  1. In a bowl, mix together the eggs, oil, seltzer water, and salt until well combined.
  2. Stir in the matzo meal and refrigerate the mixture for 30 minutes.
  3. With wet hands, form the mixture into balls.
  4. In a large pot, bring salted water to a boil and gently add the matzo balls, cooking for 30-40 minutes.
  5. Meanwhile, in another pot, simmer the chicken broth with the diced carrots, celery, and onion until the vegetables are tender.
  6. Once the matzo balls are cooked, add them to the soup and garnish with fresh dill and parsley before serving.

📌 Pinterest Tags: #cat1761230166734 #mediumrecipe #recipe #cooking #foodie #homemade #delicious #matzo #schmaltz

📌 Save this recipe to Pinterest!
